'''Tenryou Commission Headquarters''' is a location in [[Inazuma City]], [[Narukami Island]]. It is the headquarters of the [[Tenryou Commission]], the executive arm of the [[Shogunate]].

The location can first be accessed during the [[Archon Quest]], [[Chapter II]], [[Omnipresence Over Mortals|Act III]]: [[Blind Loyalty, Reckless Courage]] as a [[Quest Domain]] with the [[Tenryou Commission Headquarters (Domain)|same name]].
